data.title: Centreville, Virginia Current Local Time and Time Zone
data.meta_description: Current local time in Centreville, Virginia with information about Centreville, Virginia official time zones and daylight saving time.
data.text:
Current Local Time

Centreville, Virginia is officially in the Eastern Time Zone

The Current Time in

Centreville, Virginia is:

Wednesday

8/14/2024

7:30 AM

EDT

Centreville, Virginia

is in the

Eastern Time Zone

Time Zone

Abbreviations

Eastern Standard Time - is abbreviated as EST

Eastern Daylight Time - is abbreviated as EDT

UTC - GMT

Offset

Centreville, Virginia is GMT/UTC - 5h during Standard Time

Centreville, Virginia is GMT/UTC - 4h during Daylight Saving Time

Daylight Saving

Start Date

Centreville, Virginia starts Daylight Saving Time on

Sunday March 10, 2024 at 2:00 AM local time.
